uncommon.name: Adamantine Armor (Medium or Heavy)
uncommon.desc: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. While you’re wearing it, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

uncommon.name: Ammunition +1
uncommon.desc: You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. The bonus is determined by the rarity of the ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

uncommon.name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
uncommon.desc: While wearing this amulet, you are hidden from divination magic. You can’t be targeted by such magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

uncommon.name: Bag of Holding
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/bag-of-holding/

uncommon.name: Bag of Tricks
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/bag-of-tricks/

uncommon.name: Boots of Elvenkind
uncommon.desc: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound, regardless of the surface you are moving across. You also have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

uncommon.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
uncommon.desc: While you wear these boots, your walking speed becomes 30 feet, unless your walking speed is higher, and your speed isn’t reduced if you are encumbered or wearing heavy armor. In addition, you can jump three times the normal distance, though you can’t jump farther than your remaining movement would allow.

uncommon.name: Boots of the Winterlands
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/boots-of-the-winterlands/

uncommon.name: Bracers of Archery
uncommon.desc: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with such weapons.

uncommon.name: Brooch of Shielding
uncommon.desc: While wearing this brooch, you have resistance to force damage, and you have immunity to damage from the magic missile spell.

uncommon.name: Broom of Flying
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/broom-of-flying/

uncommon.name: Circlet of Blasting
uncommon.desc: While wearing this circlet, you can use an action to cast the scorching ray spell with it. When you make the spell’s attacks, you do so with an attack bonus of +5. The circlet can’t be used this way again until the next dawn.

uncommon.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
uncommon.desc: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, as the cloak’s color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

uncommon.name: Cloak of Protection
uncommon.desc: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.

uncommon.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
uncommon.desc: While wearing this cloak with its hood up, you can breathe underwater, and you have a swimming speed of 60 feet. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

uncommon.name: Decanter of Endless Water
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/decanter-of-endless-water/

uncommon.name: Deck of Illusions
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/deck-of-illusions/

uncommon.name: Dust of Disappearance
uncommon.desc: Found in a small packet, this powder resembles very fine sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you use an action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature and object within 10 feet of you become invisible for 2d4 minutes. The duration is the same for all subjects, and the dust is consumed when its magic takes effect. If a creature affected by the dust attacks or casts a spell, the invisibility ends for that creature.

uncommon.name: Dust of Dryness
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/dust-of-dryness/

uncommon.name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/dust-of-sneezing-and-choking/

uncommon.name: Efficient Quiver
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/efficient-quiver/

uncommon.name: Elemental Gem (Blue Sapphire)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/elemental-gem/

uncommon.name: Elemental Gem (Yellow Diamond)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/elemental-gem/

uncommon.name: Elemental Gem (Red Corundum)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/elemental-gem/

uncommon.name: Elemental Gem (Emerald)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/elemental-gem/

uncommon.name: Eversmoking Bottle
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/eversmoking-bottle/

uncommon.name: Eyes of Charming
uncommon.desc: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. They have 3 charges. While wearing them, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the charm person spell (save DC 13) on a humanoid within 30 feet of you, provided that you and the target can see each other. The lenses regain all expended charges daily at dawn.

uncommon.name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
uncommon.desc: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you can see much better than normal out to a range of 1 foot. You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks that rely on sight while searching an area or studying an object within that range.

uncommon.name: Eyes of the Eagle
uncommon.desc: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.

uncommon.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/figurine-of-wondrous-power/

uncommon.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
uncommon.desc: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Strength is already 19 or higher.

uncommon.name: Gem of Brightness
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/gem-of-brightness/

uncommon.name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/gloves-of-missile-snaring/

uncommon.name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
uncommon.desc: While wearing these gloves, climbing and swimming don’t cost you extra movement, and you gain a +5 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb or swim.

uncommon.name: Goggles of Night
uncommon.desc: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.

uncommon.name: Hat of Disguise
uncommon.desc: While wearing this hat, you can use an action to cast the disguise self spell from it at will. The spell ends if the hat is removed.

uncommon.name: Headband of Intellect
uncommon.desc: Your Intelligence score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is already 19 or higher.

uncommon.name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
uncommon.desc: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the comprehend languages spell from it at will.

uncommon.name: Helm of Telepathy
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/helm-of-telepathy/

uncommon.name: Immovable Rod
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/immovable-rod/

uncommon.name: Javelin of Lightning
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/javelin-of-lightning/

uncommon.name: Lantern of Revealing
uncommon.desc: While lit, this hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Invisible creatures and objects are visible as long as they are in the lantern’s bright light. You can use an action to lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

uncommon.name: Medallion of Thoughts
uncommon.desc: The medallion has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13) from it. The medallion regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

uncommon.name: Mithral Armor (Medium or Heavy)
uncommon.desc: Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn’t.

uncommon.name: Necklace of Adaptation
uncommon.desc: While wearing this necklace, you can breathe normally in any environment, and you have advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as cloudkill and stinking cloud effects, inhaled poisons, and the breath weapons of some dragons).

uncommon.name: Oil of Slipperiness
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/oil-of-slipperiness/

uncommon.name: Pearl of Power
uncommon.desc: While this pearl is on your person, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you use the pearl, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

uncommon.name: Periapt of Health
uncommon.desc: You are immune to contracting any disease while you wear this pendant. If you are already infected with a disease, the effects of the disease are suppressed you while you wear the pendant.

uncommon.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
uncommon.desc: While you wear this pendant, you stabilize whenever you are dying at the start of your turn. In addition, whenever you roll a Hit Die to regain hit points, double the number of hit points it restores.

uncommon.name: Philter of Love
uncommon.desc: The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philter, you become charmed by that creature for 1 hour. If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted to, you regard it as your true love while you are charmed. This potion’s rose-hued, effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

uncommon.name: Pipes of Haunting
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/pipes-of-haunting/

uncommon.name: Pipes of the Sewers
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/pipes-of-the-sewers/

uncommon.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
uncommon.desc: When you drink this potion, you can cast the animal friendship spell (save DC 13) for 1 hour at will. Agitating this muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scale, a hummingbird tongue, a cat claw, or a squirrel hair.

uncommon.name: Potion of Hill Giant Strength
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/potion-of-giant-strength/

uncommon.name: Potion of Growth
uncommon.desc: When you drink this potion, you gain the “enlarge” effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion’s liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

uncommon.name: Potion of Greater Healing
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/potion-of-healing/

uncommon.name: Potion of Poison
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/potion-of-poison/

uncommon.name: Potion of Resistance
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/potion-of-resistance/

uncommon.name: Potion of Water Breathing
uncommon.desc: You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion. Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

uncommon.name: Restorative Ointment
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/restorative-ointment/

uncommon.name: Ring of Jumping
uncommon.desc: While wearing this ring, you can cast the jump spell from it as a bonus action at will, but can target only yourself when you do so.

uncommon.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/ring-of-mind-shielding/

uncommon.name: Ring of Swimming
uncommon.desc: You have a swimming speed of 40 feet while wearing this ring.

uncommon.name: Ring of Warmth
uncommon.desc: While wearing this ring, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as –50 degrees Fahrenheit.

uncommon.name: Ring of Water Walking
uncommon.desc: While wearing this ring, you can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

uncommon.name: Robe of Useful Items
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/robe-of-useful-items/

uncommon.name: Rope of Climbing
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/rope-of-climbing/

uncommon.name: Shield +1
uncommon.desc: While holding this shield, you have a bonus to AC determined by the shield’s rarity. This bonus is in addition to the shield’s normal bonus to AC.

uncommon.name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
uncommon.desc: While you wear these light shoes, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. However, the slippers don’t allow you to move this way on a slippery surface, such as one covered by ice or oil.

uncommon.name: Spell Scroll (2nd Level)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/spell-scroll/

uncommon.name: Spell Scroll (3rd Level)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/spell-scroll/

uncommon.name: Staff of the Python
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/staff-of-the-python/

uncommon.name: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone)
uncommon.desc: While this polished agate is on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

uncommon.name: Trident of Fish Command
uncommon.desc: This trident is a magic weapon. It has 3 charges. While you carry it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast dominate beast (save DC 15) from it on a beast that has an innate swimming speed. The trident regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

uncommon.name: Wand of Magic Detection
uncommon.desc: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the detect magic spell from it. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

uncommon.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/wand-of-magic-missiles/

uncommon.name: Wand of Secrets
uncommon.desc: The wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges, and if a secret door or trap is within 30 feet of you, the wand pulses and points at the one nearest to you. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

uncommon.name: Wand of the War Mage (+1)
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/wand-of-the-war-mage/

uncommon.name: Wand of Web
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/wand-of-web/

uncommon.name: Weapon +1
uncommon.desc: You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The bonus is determined by the weapon’s rarity.

uncommon.name: Wind Fan
uncommon.desc: While holding this fan, you can use an action to cast the gust of wind spell (save DC 13) from it. Once used, the fan shouldn’t be used again until the next dawn. Each time it is used again before then, it has a cumulative 20 percent chance of not working and tearing into useless, nonmagical tatters.

uncommon.name: Winged Boots
uncommon.desc: https://dnd5e.info/magic-items/item/winged-boots/
